Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • Book

  • public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Book class that is needed for the LibraryTesterSutter, Link, LinkList and Library classes This includes a constructor for an empty book, a constructor for a book with all the information, a method to enter the information, a method to change the in/out status of the book, a method to see the status, a method to get the title of a book, a method to change the title of a book, and finally, a toString method to print all of the information
    Author:
    Annika Sutter
